## Introduction

For automated cell clustering, two methods are provided at the moment:

* FlowSOM 
* ClusterX
    

## Command

<br>

```
Cell_cluster  (--InputFile=<InputFile> --tsneInput=<tsne_dims.RDS> --method=<method> --outputDir=<results_dir>) [--FlowSOM_k=<k> --prefix=<prefix>]
```

<br>

```
Options:
--inputFiles=<files>            A file containing the expression matrix after transformation
--tsneInput=<tsnedims>          A file containing the T-sne Y matrix i.e the first and second dimensions 
--method=<method>               options:FLOWSOM, ClusteX
--FlowSOM_K=<k>                 Number of clusters to generate in FlowSOM
--prefix=<p>                    prefix for output files and plots
```

<br>

### Output files

Filename | Description
---------|------------------------------------------
<a href="img/clustering.png">clustering_X.png</a>| Generates a t-SNE plot 
clustering.RDS | A file which contains the clustering results.
